div.head: 不能遠視精華之氣 衰弱，故不能遠視
div.div: inability to see into the distance; shortsightedness cannot see into the distance

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

form.orth: 不能遠視精華之氣 衰弱，故不能遠視
form.usg: [3] PC with distant objects appearing unclear as major sign.

entry.def: inability to see into the distance; shortsightedness cannot see into the distance
